name: John D. HUDSON, Appellant v. Benjamin MARTINEZ, Acting Chairman, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Appellee

parties: John D. HUDSON, Appellant v. Benjamin MARTINEZ, Acting Chairman, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of October, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
861 A.2d 258
John D. HUDSON, Appellant v. Benjamin MARTINEZ, Acting Chairman, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 7, 2004.
